text: Koila Moila is a village in the Chirang district of Assam state in India.It is situated 31 km away from the district headquarter of Kajalgaon and 202 km from state capital Dispur. ==Educational institutes== * ST Peter's E.M High school * * Zion English School * Koila moila Junior College * Mount Everest English School . ==Town== Bijni and Bongaigaon Town are the nearest to Koila Moila. ==References== Category:Villages in India Category:Settlements in Assam
title: Koila Moila
